summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of October 1, 2016, to October 31, 2016. It includes information on account balances, service charges, and interest calculations, indicating minimal activity during the month.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance for the Butterfly Trust as of October 31, 2016, was $2.98.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $50.00.
The document outlines procedures for reporting errors in account statements.
The statement indicates that all items are credited subject to final collection and receipt of proceeds.
